pull.title: wallet: Fix sendall with watchonly wallets and specified inputs
pull.body:
The `sendall` RPC would previously fail when used with a watchonly wallet and specified inputs. This failure was caused by checking isminetype equality with ISMINE_ALL rather than a bitwise AND as IsMine can never return ISMINE_ALL.

Also added a test.

events.message:
wallet: Correctly check ismine for sendall

sendall should be using a bitwise AND for sendall's IsMine check rather
than an equality as IsMine will never return ISMINE_ALL.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25375](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25375) (rpc: add minconf/maxconf options to sendall and fund transaction calls by ishaanam)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Code review ACK d442101d

With an extra crash finding that doesn't necessarily need to be included here.

events.message: test: Test that sendall works with watchonly spending specific utxos
wallet: Check utxo prevout index out of bounds in sendall
test: Test for out of bounds vout in sendall

events.body:
> Commits can be squashed.

I prefer to keep implementation separate from test so that tests can be easily cherry-picked onto master to verify that they fail.

comments.body:
Not related to this PR, but.. pretty sure that we can make the node crash by providing an out-of-bounds input prevout index.

e.g. 
```diff
diff --git a/test/functional/wallet_sendall.py b/test/functional/wallet_sendall.py
--- a/test/functional/wallet_sendall.py	(revision d442101d85e1f89b072145345ea0bcf60d6ceacc)
+++ b/test/functional/wallet_sendall.py	(date 1666283169723)
@@ -294,6 +294,7 @@
         else:
             watchonly.importmulti(import_req)
 
+        utxo["vout"] = 10
         sendall_tx_receipt = watchonly.sendall(recipients=[self.remainder_target], options={"inputs": [utxo]})
         psbt = sendall_tx_receipt["psbt"]
         decoded = self.nodes[0].decodepsbt(psbt)
```
